fields.name: consumptionType
fields.description: General indicator that the item passively or actively consumes some other item or resource.  It's up to the implementation rule to determine how.

fields.name: consumption
fields.description: General indicator of how much of the consumptionType is consumed.  It's up to the implementation rule to determine how.

fields.name: replenishmentType
fields.description: General indicator that the item passively or actively replenishes some other item or resource.  It's up to the implementation rule to determine how.

fields.name: replenishment
fields.description: General indicator of how much of the replenishmentType is replenished.  It's up to the implementation rule to determine how.
